ai-thig3.1:1.3_0: I don’t know that I had ever found
ai-thig3.1:2.1_0: Failing to find peace of heart,
ai-thig3.1:2.3_0: When I remembered the victor’s instructions,
ai-thig3.1:2.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
ai-thig3.1:3.3_0: I have reached the end of craving
ai-thig3.1:3.5_0: Now it is the seventh night
ai-thig3.1:4.1_0: ... The further senior nun is junior.
